scenario_name: Return to Heart of the Elders, Part 2
full_name: Scenario V–B: Return to Heart of the Elders, Part 2

steps.text: Search the collection for the new Harbinger of Valusia (The Sleeper Returns) and set it aside, out of play. If the Harbinger of Valusia would enter play during this scenario, use this version instead of the original one.

Create the exploration deck. This is done by taking the 5 remaining single-sided locations from the K’n-yan encounter set. Include only 1 of the 2 locations with each of the following connection symbols, chosen at random.
steps.subtext: Remove the other 4 [[Ancient]] locations from the game. Do not include any of the other encounter cards listed in the original setup instructions. (There should be a total of 5 cards, not counting the set-aside Descent to Yoth.)

steps.text: For the duration of this scenario, the following additional rules apply:

bullets.text: The 'check your supplies' ability on the Mouth of K'n-yan can be used from any location, and it discards enemies as well as treacheries.
Forced - After a successful exploration ends: Shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the exploration deck.

steps.text: Which investigator should add the "Sticky Goop" to their supplies?

supplies.name: Sticky Goop
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in a subterranean swamp.
